name: John Doe
title: 450k on X
text: He took our vague idea, cleaned it up, and turned it something people actually wanted to use.

name: Alice Smith
title: Design Lead
text: Working with this team was transformative for our product. Their attention to detail is unmatched.

title: CEO at TechCo
text: A true professional who understands both design and business needs. Highly recommend.

title: Product Manager
text: Incredible work ethic and creative vision. Delivered beyond our expectations every single time.

text: His designs helped us secure our Series A funding. The investor deck was absolutely stunning.

text: One of the most talented designers I've worked with. Brings both creativity and strategic thinking.

text: Perfect balance between aesthetics and functionality. User engagement increased by 200%.

text: Their ability to translate complex requirements into simple, elegant designs is remarkable.
